Itâ€™s Your Fault Act
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act with respect to fentanyl.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
It's Your Fault Act
This bill increases from 5 to 15 years the time period that a non-U.S. national (alien under federal law) who is a spouse or child of an illicit trafficker of a controlled substance, and who benefitted from such illicit activity, is ineligible for a visa or admission into the United States.
